GSP33m_mbhtnu:2621: sa pañcaviṃ śat punarabdakānāmastrāṇi cābhyasya paterbhṛgūṇām |
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2622: mātrā samānīya taṭe nije tu saṃ sthāpitaḥ prārpayituṃ svapitre |
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2623: sa tatra baddhvā ṇsarapañjareṇa gaṅgāṃ vijahre'sya pitā tadaiva |
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2624: vrajan mṛgārthī tṛṣito vilokayan gaṅgāmatoyāmabhavat suvismitaḥ |
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2625: sa mārgayāmāsa tato'sya hetujñaptyai tadā svaṃ ca dadarśa sūnum |
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2627: mīmāṃ samānaṃ tamavāpa gaṅgā sutaṃ samādāya patiṃ jagāda ca |
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2629: asyāgrajāḥ svāṃ sthitimeva yātā hareḥ padāmbhojasupāvite jale |
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2630: tanūrmadīye praṇidhāya tat tvaṃ t ān mā ṇsuco'nena ca modamānaḥ |
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2631: iti pradāyāmumadṛśyatāmagād gaṅgā tamādāya yayau svakaṃ gṛham |
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2632: rājā'bhiṣicyātha ca yauvarājye mumoda tatsadguṇatarpito bhṛśam |
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2633: punaḥ sa pitrā'numato bṛhaspateravāpa vedān puruṣāyuṣo'rddhataḥ |
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2636: pituṃ samīpaṃ samavāpya taṃ ca śuśrūṣamāṇaḥ pramumoda vīraḥ |
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2637: yadaiva gaṅgā suṣuve'ṣṭamaṃ sutaṃ tadaiva yāto mṛgayāṃ sa śantanuḥ |
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2638: śaradvato jātamapaśyaduttamaṃ vane visṛṣṭaṃ mithunaṃ tvayonijam |
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2639: śaradvāṃ stu tapaḥ kurvan dadarśa sahasorvaśīm |
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2642: hareḥ prāptuṃ tathā tārā bhāryā yā hibṛhaspateḥ |
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2643: t āvubhau śantanurdṛṣṭvā kṛpāviṣṭaḥ svakaṃ gṛham |
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2644: nināya nāma cakre ca kṛpāyā viṣayau yataḥ |
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2645: kṛpaḥ kṛpīti sa kṛpastapo viṣṇoṇscakāra ha |
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2653: yadā hijātaḥ sa kṛpastadaiva bṛhaspateḥ sūnuragācca gaṅgām |
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2654: snātuṃ ghṛt ācīṃ sa dadarśa tatra ślathaddukūlāṃ suravaryakāminīm |
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2655: taddarśanāt skannamathendriyaṃ sa droṇe dadhārā'śu tato'bhavat svayam |
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2656: ambhojajāveśayuto bṛhaspatiḥ kartuṃ hareḥ karma bhuvo bharoddhṛtau |
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2657: droṇetināmāsya cakāra tāto munirbharadvāja utāsya vedān |
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2659: kāle ca tasmin pṛṣato'napatyo vane tu pāñcālapatiścacāra |
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2660: tapo mahat tasya tathā varāpsarāvalokanāt skanditamāṇsu retaḥ |
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2661: sa tad vilajjāvaśataḥ padena samākramat tasya babhūva sūnuḥ |
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2662: hahū tunāmnā sa viriñcagāyako nāmnā'vaho yo marutāṃ tadaṃ śayuk |
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2663: sa droṇatātāt samavāpa vedānastrāṇi vidyāṇsca tathā samastāḥ |
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2664: droṇena yuktaḥ sa tadā guroḥ sutaṃ sahaiva nau rājyamiti hyavādīt |
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2665: cxv.pade drutatvād drupadābhidheyaḥ sa rājyamāpātha nijāṃ kṛpīṃ saḥ |
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2666: droṇo'pi bhāryāṃ samavāpya sarvapratigrahojjhaśca pure'vasat sukhī |
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2667: siloñchavṛttyaiva hi vartayan sa dharmaṃ mahāntaṃ virajaṃ juṣāṇaḥ |
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2668: uvāsa nāgākhyapure sakhā sa devavratasyātha kṛpasya caiva |
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2669: teṣāṃ samāno vayasā virāṭastvabhūddhahā nāma vidhātṛgāyakaḥ |
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2670: marutsu yo vivaho nāma tasyāpyaṃ śena yukto nijadharmavartī |
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2671: tataḥ kadācinmṛgayāṃ gataḥ sa dadarśa kanyāpravarāṃ tu śantanuḥ |
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2672: yā pūrvasarge pitṛputrikā satī cacāra viṣṇostapa uttamaṃ ciram |
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2673: yasyai varaṃ viṣṇuradāt purā'haṃ sutastava syāmiti yā vasoḥ sutā |
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2674: j ātā punardāṇsagṛhe vivarddhitā vyāsātmanā viṣṇurabhūcca yasyām |
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2676: ṛte sa tasyāstanayasya rājyaṃ naicchad dātuṃ t āmathā'yād gṛhaṃ svam |
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2677: taccintayā glānamukhaṃ janitraṃ dṛṣṭvaiva devavrata āṇsvapṛcchat |
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2679: sa tasya viśvāsakṛte pratijñāṃ cakāra nāhaṃ karavāṇi rājyam |
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2680: tathaiva me santatito bhayaṃ te vyaitūrdhvaretāḥ satataṃ bhavāni |
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2681: bhīmavratatvāddhi tadā'sya nāma kṛtvā devā bhīṣma iti hyacīklṛpan |
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2682: prasūnavṛṣṭiṃ sa ca dāṇsadattāṃ kāl . īṃ samādāya pituḥ samarpayat |
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2683: j ñātvā tutāṃ rājaputrīṃ guṇāḍhyāṃ satyasya viṣṇormātaraṃ nāmatastat |
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2684: loke prasiddhāṃ satyavatītyudārāṃ vivāhayāmāsa pituḥ sa bhīṣmaḥ |
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2685: prāyaḥ satāṃ na manaḥ pāpamārge gacchediti hyātmamanaśca saktam |
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2686: j ñātvā'pi tāṃ dāṇsagṛhe vivarddhitāṃ jagrāha saddharmarataśca śantanuḥ |
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2688: yuddheṣu bhīṣmasya nṛpottamaḥ sa reme tayaivābdagaṇān bahūṃ śca |
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2689: cxvi.lebhe sa citrāṅgadamatra putraṃ tathā dvitīyaṃ ca vicitravīryam |
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2690: tayośca bālye vyadhunoccharīraṃ jīrṇena dehena hi kiṃ mameti |
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2691: svecchayā varuṇatvaṃ sa prāpa nānicchayā tanuḥ |
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2692: tasmin kāle tyajyate hi balavadbhirvadhaṃ vinā |
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2704: ambikāmbālike tatra saṃ vādaṃ cakratuḥ śubhe |
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2705: ambā sā bhīṣmabhāryaiva pūrvadehe tu naicchata |
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2707: uvāca tāṃ sa tatyāja sā'gamat sālvameva ca |
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2709: bhīṣmamāpa sa nāgṛhṇāt prayayau sā'pi bhārgavam |
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2711: bhīṣmāya tu yaśo dātuṃ yuyudhe tena bhārgavaḥ |
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2712: cxvii.anantaśaktirapi sa na bhīṣmaṃ nijaghāna ha |
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2714: anantaśaktiḥ sakalāntarātmā yaḥ sarvavit sarvavaśī ca sarvajit |
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2715: na yatsamo'nyo'sti kathañca kutracit kathaṃ hyaśaktiḥ paramasya tasya |
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2716: bhīṣmaṃ svabhaktaṃ yaśasā'bhipūrayan vimohayannāsurāṃ ścaiva rāmaḥ |
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2717: jitvaiva bhīṣmaṃ na jaghāna devo vācaṃ ca satyāmakarot sa tasya |
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2721: yaśo bhīṣmasya datvā tu so'mbāṃ ca śaraṇāgatām |
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2723: anantaraṃ śikhaṇḍitvāt tadā sā ṇsāṅkaraṃ tapaḥ |
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2724: bhīṣmasya nidhanārthāya puṃ stvārthaṃ ca cakāra ha |
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2725: bhīṣmo yathā tvāṃ gṛhṇīyāt tathā kuryāmitīritam |
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2726: rāmeṇa satyaṃ taccakre bhīṣme dehāntaraṃ gate |
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2727: rudrastu tasyāstapasā tuṣṭaḥ prādād varaṃ tadā |
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2729: mālāṃ ca ya imāṃ mālāṃ gṛhṇīyāt sa haniṣyati |
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2730: bhīṣmamityeva tāṃ mālāṃ gṛhītvā sā nṛpān yayau |
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2731: t āṃ na bhīṣmabhayāt ke'pi jagṛhustāṃ hi sā tataḥ |
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2732: drupadasya gṛhadvāri nyasya yogāt tanuṃ jahau |
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2734: cakāra śambhave cainaṃ so'bravīt kanyakā tava |
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2736: cxviii.nāmnā ṇsikhaṇḍinī tasyāḥ puṃ vat karmāṇi cākarot |
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2738: udvāhayāmāsa sā tāṃ puṃ veṣeṇaiva gūhitām |
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2739: anyatra mātāpitrostu na vijñātāṃ bubodha ha |
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2740: dhātryai nyavedayat sā'tha tatpitre sā nyavedayat |
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2741: sa kruddhaḥ preṣayāmāsa nihanmi tvāṃ sabāndhavam |
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2748: iti matvā vanāyaiva yayau tatra ca tumburuḥ |
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2750: sa tasyā akhilaṃ śrutvā kṛpāṃ cakre mahāmanāḥ |
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2751: sa tasyai svaṃ vapuḥ prādāt tadīyaṃ jagṛhe tathā |
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2752: aṃ śena puṃ svabhāvārthaṃ pūrvadehe samāsthitaḥ |
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2753: puṃ sāṃ strītvaṃ bhavet kvāpi tathā'pyante pumān bhavet |
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2754: strīṇāṃ naiva hi puṃ stvaṃ syād balavatkāraṇairapi |
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2756: paścāt pundehamapi sā praviveśaiva puṃ yutam |
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2757: nāsyā dehaḥ puṃ stvamāpa naca puṃ sā'nadhiṣṭhite |
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2758: puṃ dehe nyavasat sā'tha gandharveṇa tvadhiṣṭhitam |
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2762: śvo dehi mama dehaṃ me svaṃ ca dehaṃ samāviśa |
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2763: ityuktvā sa tu gandharvaḥ kanyādehaṃ samāsthitaḥ |
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2767: yadā yuddhe mṛtiṃ yāti sā kanyā puntanusthitā |
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2772: śvobhūte sā tu gandharvaṃ prāpya tadvacanāt punaḥ |
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2773: yayau tenaiva dehena puṃ stvameva samāṇsritā |
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2775: vicitravīryaḥ pramadādvayaṃ tat samprāpya reme'bdagaṇān susaktaḥ |
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2776: tatyāja dehaṃ ca sa yakṣmaṇā'rditastato'sya mātā'smaradāṇsu kṛṣṇam |
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2778: samastavijñānatanuḥ sukhārṇavaḥ sampūjayāmāsa ca taṃ janitrī |
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2779: taṃ bhīṣmapūrvaiḥ paramādarārcitaṃ svabhiṣṭutaṃ cāvadadasya mātā |
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2780: putrau mṛtau me natu rājyamaicchad bhīṣmo mayā nitarāmarthito'pi |
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2783: ṛte ramāṃ j ātu mamāṅgayogayogyā'ṅganā naiva surālaye'pi |
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2784: tathā'pi te vākyamahaṃ kariṣye sāṃ vatsaraṃ sā caratu vrataṃ ca |
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2785: cxx.sā pūtadehā'tha ca vaiṣṇavavratānmattaḥ samāpnotu sutaṃ variṣṭham |
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2786: itīrite rāṣṭramupaiti nāṇsamiti bruvantīṃ punarāha vākyam |
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2788: saheta sā tad yadi putrako'syā bhaved guṇāḍhyo balavīryayuktaḥ |
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2789: itīrite'stvityuditastayā'gamat kṛṣṇo'mbikāṃ sā tu bhiyā nyamīlayat |
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2791: sa mārutāveśabalād balādhiko babhūva rājā dhṛtarāṣṭranāmā |
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2792: adād varaṃ cāsya balādhikatvaṃ kṛṣṇo'ndha āsīt sa tu mātṛdoṣataḥ |
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2793: j ñātvā tamandhaṃ punareva kṛṣṇaṃ mātā'bravījjanayānyaṃ guṇāḍhyam |
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2794: ambālikāyāmiti tat tathā'karod bhayāttu sā pāṇḍurabhūnmṛṣādṛk |
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2795: parāvaho nāma marut tato'bhavad varṇena pāṇḍuḥ sa hi nāmataśca |
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2796: sa cā'sa vīryādhika eva vāyorāveśataḥ sarvaśastrāstravettā |
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2797: tasmai tathā balavīryādhikatvavaraṃ prādāt kṛṣṇa evātha pāṇḍum |
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2798: vijñāya taṃ prāha punaśca mātā nirdoṣamanyaṃ janayottamaṃ sutam |
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2799: uktveti kṛṣṇaṃ punareva ca snuṣāmāha tvayā'kṣṇorhi nimīlanaṃ purā |
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2800: kṛtaṃ tataste suta āsa cāndhastataḥ punaḥ kṛṣṇamupāsva bhaktitaḥ |
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2801: itīritā'pyasya hi māyayā sā bhīt ā bhujiṣyāṃ kumatirnyayojayat |
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2802: sā taṃ parānandatanuṃ guṇārṇavaṃ samprāpya bhaktyā parayaiva reme |
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2803: tasyāṃ sa devo'jani dharmarājo māṇḍavyaśāpād ya uvāha śūdratām |
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2807: nāsatyatā tasya ca tatra hetutaḥ śāpaṃ gṛhītuṃ sa tathaiva coktvā |
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2808: cxxi.avāpa śūdratvamathāsya nāma cakre kṛṣṇaḥ sarvavittvaṃ tathā'dāt |
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2811: j ñātvā'sya śūdratvamathāsya mātā punaśca kṛṣṇaṃ praṇatā yayāce |
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2813: yogyāni karmāṇi tatastu teṣāṃ cakāra bhīṣmo munibhiryathāvat |
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2814: vidyāḥ samastā adadācca kṛṣṇasteṣāṃ pāṇḍorastraśastrāṇi bhīṣmaḥ |
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2817: gavadgaṇādāsa tathaiva sūtāt samastagandharvapatiḥ sa tumburuḥ |
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2818: ya udvaho nāma marut tadaṃ śayukto vaśī sañjayanāmadheyaḥ |
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2819: vicitravīryasya sa sūtaputraḥ sakhā ca teṣāmabhavat priyaśca |
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2823: śūrasya putrī guṇaṇsīlarūpayuktā dattā sakhyureva svapitrā |
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2824: nāmnā pṛthā kuntibhojasya tena kuntī bhāryā pūrvadehe'pi pāṇḍoḥ |
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2825: kūrmaśca nāmnā marudeva kuntibhojo'thaināṃ varddhayāmāsa samyak |
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2826: tatrā'gamacchaṅkarāṃ śo'tikopo durvāsāstaṃ prāha māṃ vāsayeti |
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2827: tamāha rājā yadi kanyakāyāḥ kṣamiṣyase śaktitaḥ karma kartryāḥ |
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2828: sukhaṃ vasetyomiti tena coktaḥ śuśrūṣaṇāyā'diśadāṇsu kuntīm |
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2829: cakāra karma sā pṛthā muneḥ sukopanasya hi |
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2833: ṛtau tu sā samāplutā parīkṣaṇāya tanmanoḥ |
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2835: tato na sā visarjituṃ śaśāka taṃ vinā ratim |
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2837: sa tatra jajñivān svayaṃ dvitīyarūpako vibhuḥ |
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2850: saṃ vṛddho nikhilāḥ śrutīradhijagau śāstrāṇi sarvāṇi ca|
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2853: atha kuntī dattā sā pāṇḍoḥ so'pyetayā ciraṃ reme |
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2854: śūrācchūdryāṃ j ātāṃ viduro'vahadāruṇīṃ guṇāḍhyāṃ ca |
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2856: kanyāratnaṃ cecchaṃ ścakre brāhmaṃ tapo varaṃ cā'pa |
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2859: sa mārutāveśavaśāt pṛthivyāṃ balādhiko'bhūd varataśca dhātuḥ |
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2860: śalyaśca nāmnā'khilaśatruśalyo babhūva kanyā'sya ca mādrināmnī |
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2861: sā pāṇḍubhāryaiva ca pūrvajanmanyabhūt punaśca pratipāditā'smai |
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2862: śalyaśca rājyaṃ pitṛdattamañjo jugopa dharmeṇa samastaśāstravit |
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2863: athāṅganāratnamavāpya tad dvayaṃ pāṇḍustu bhogān bubhuje yatheṣṭataḥ |
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2865: bhīṣmo hi rāṣṭre dhṛtarāṣṭrameva saṃ sthāpya pāṇḍuṃ yuvarājameva |
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2866: cakre tathā'pyandha iti sma rājyaṃ cakāra nāsāvakarocca pāṇḍuḥ |
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2869: naiṣā virodhe kurupāṇḍavānāṃ tiṣṭhediti vyāsa udīrṇasadguṇaḥ |
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2870: svamātaraṃ svāṇsramameva ninye snuṣe ca tasyā yayatuḥ sma tāmanu |
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2871: sutoktamārgeṇa vicintya taṃ hariṃ sutātmanā brahmatayā casā yayau |
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2872: paraṃ padaṃ vaiṣṇavameva kṛṣṇaprasādataḥ svaryayatuḥ snuṣe ca| 11.165 |
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2873: mātā casā vidurasyā'pa lokaṃ vairiñcamanveva gatā'mbikāṃ satī |
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2874: vyāsaprasādāt sutasadguṇaiśca kālena muktiṃ ca jagāma sanmatiḥ |
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2875: ambālikā'pi kramayogato'gāt parāṃ gatiṃ naiva tathā'mbikā yayau |
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2876: yathāyathā viṣṇuparaścidātmā tathātathā hyasya gatiḥ paratra |
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2877: pāṇḍustato rājyabharaṃ nidhāya jyeṣṭhe'nuje caiva vanaṃ jagāma |
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2879: cxxiv.gṛhāṇsrameṇaiva vane nivāsaṃ kurvan sa bhogān bubhuje tapaśca |
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2880: cakre munīndraiḥ sahito jagatpatiṃ ramāpatiṃ bhaktiyuto'bhipūjayan |
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2881: sa kāmato hariṇatvaṃ prapannaṃ daivādṛṣiṃ grāmyakarmānuṣaktam |

GSP33m_mbhtnu:3809: pratyudyamo bhagavatā'pi bhaved gadāyāḥ śikṣā yadā bhagavatā kriyate

GSP33m_mbhtnu:3812: rāmo'pi śikṣitamarīndradharāt puro'sya bhīme dadāvatha varāṇi hareravāpa |
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3813: astrāṇi śakratanayaḥ sahadeva āra nītiṃ tathoddhavamukhāt sakalāmudārām |
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3816: duḥkhaṃ vināṇsaya vacobhirare madīyairnandādināṃ virahajaṃ mama cā'śu yāhi
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3817: matto viyoga iha kasyacidasti naiva yasmādahaṃ tanubhṛt āṃ nihato'ntareva
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3818: nāhaṃ manuṣya iti kutraca vo'stu buddhirbrahmaiva nirmalatamaṃ pravadanti
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3820: pūrvaṃ yadā hyajagaro nijagāra nandaṃ sarve na śekuratha tatpravimokṣaṇāya
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3821: matpādasaṃ sparśataḥ sa tadā'tidivyo vidyādharastaduditaṃ nikhilaṃ smarantu |
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3822: pūrvaṃ sa rūpamadataḥ prajahāsa viprān nityaṃ tapaḥ kṛśatarāṅgiraso virūpān |
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3823: taiḥ prāpitaḥ sapadi so'jagaratvameva matto nijāṃ tanumavāpya jagāda nandam |
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3824: nāyaṃ naro harirayaṃ paramaḥ parebhyo viśveśvaraḥ sakalakāraṇa ātmatantraḥ |
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3825: vijñāya cainamurusaṃ sṛtito vimuktā yāntyasya pādayugal . aṃ munayo virāgāḥ |
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3826: nandaṃ yadā ca jagṛhe varuṇasya dūtastatrāpi māṃ jalapatergṛhamāṇsu yātam
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3827: sampūjya vāripatirāha vimucya nandaṃ nāyaṃ sutastava pumān paramaḥ sa eṣaḥ
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3828: sandarśito nanu mayaiva vikuṇṭhaloko gojīvināṃ sthitirapi pravarā madīyā |
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3829: mānuṣyabuddhimapanetumaje mayi sma tasmānmayi sthitimavāpya śamaṃ prayāntu
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3830: śrutvoddhavo nigaditaṃ paramasya puṃ so vṛndāvanaṃ prati yayau vacanaiśca tasya |
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3831: duḥkhaṃ vyapohya nikhilaṃ paśujīvanānāmāyāt punaścaraṇasannidhimeva viṣṇoḥ
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3835: evaṃ praśāsati jagat puruṣottame'smin bhīmārjunau tu sahadevayutāvanujñām |
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3837: sairandhrikodarabhavaḥ sa tu nāradasya śiṣyo vṛkodararathasya babhūva yantā |
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3838: yā piṅgalā'nyabhava ātmani saṃ sthitaṃ taṃ saṃ smṛtya kāntamurugāyamabhūt trivakrā |
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3839: taṃ pañcarātravidamāpya suṣārathiṃ sa bhīmo mumoda punarāpa parātmavidyām |
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3840: vyāsāt parātmata uvāca ca phalgunādidaiveṣu sarvavijayī paravidyayaiṣaḥ |

GSP33m_mbhtnu:3848: drauṇistadā dhārtarāṣṭraiḥ sametya krīḍan payaḥ pātumupaiti sadma |
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3849: tasmai mātā piṣṭamāloḍya pātuṃ dadāti pītvaiti tadeṣa nityam |
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3850: pītakṣīrān dhārtarāṣṭrān sa caitya mayā pītaṃ kṣīramityāha nityam |
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3851: nṛtyantamenaṃ pāyayāmāsurete payaḥ kadācid rasamasya so'vet |
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3852: punaḥ kadācit sa tu mātṛdatte piṣṭe nedaṃ kṣīramityārurāva |
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3854: sampreritaḥ kṛpayā cā'rtarūpo droṇo yayāvārjayituṃ tadā gām |
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3855: pratigrahāt sannivṛttaḥ sa rāmaṃ yayau na viṣṇorhi bhavet pratigrahaḥ |
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3856: doṣāya yasmāt sa pitā'khilasya svāmī guruḥ paramaṃ daivataṃ ca |
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3857: clxvi.dṛṣṭvaivainaṃ j āmadagnyo'pyacintayad droṇaṃ kartuṃ kṣitibhārāpanode
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3858: hetuṃ surāṇāṃ narayonijānāṃ hantā cāyaṃ syāt saha putreṇa ceti |
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3859: teṣāṃ vṛddhiḥ syāt pāṇḍavārthe hatānāṃ mokṣe'pi saukhyasya na santatiśca |
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3860: yogyā surāṇāṃ kalijā supāpāḥ prāyo yasmāt kalijāḥ sambhavanti |
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3861: na devānāmāṇsataṃ pūruṣā hi santānajāḥ prāyaśaḥ pāpayogyāḥ |
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3863: avyucchinne sakalānāṃ surāṇāṃ tantau kalirno bhavitā kathañcit |
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3864: tasmādutsādyāḥ sarva ete surāṃ śā etena sākaṃ tanayena vīrāḥ |
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3865: evaṃ vicintyāpratimaḥ sa bhārgavo babhāṣa īṣatsmitaśociṣā girā |
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3866: anantaśaktiḥ sakaleśvaro'pi tyaktaṃ sarvaṃ nādya vittaṃ mamāsti |
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3867: ātmā vidyā ṇsastrametāvadasti teṣāṃ madhye rucitaṃ tvaṃ gṛhāṇa |
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3868: uktaḥ sa itthaṃ pravicintya vipro jagāda kastvadgrahaṇe samarthaḥ |
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3870: svāmyaṃ tavecchan pratiyātyadho hi yasmānnacotthātumalaṃ kadācit |
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3872: vidyaiva deyā bhavatā tato'ja sarvaprakāṇsinyacalā susūkṣmā |
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3873: itīritastattvavidyādikāḥ sa vidyāḥ sarvāḥ pradadau sāstraśastrāḥ |
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3874: abdadviṣaṭkena samāpya tāḥ sa yayau sakhāyaṃ drupadaṃ mahātmā |
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3875: dāne'rddharājyasya hi tatpratijñāṃ saṃ smṛtya pūrvāmupayātaṃ sakhāyam |
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3876: sakhā tavāsmīti tadodito'pi jagāda vākyaṃ drupado'tidarpāt |
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3877: na nirdhano rājasakho bhaveta yatheṣṭato gaccha vipreti daivāt |
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3879: pratigrahāt sannivṛttena so'yaṃ mayā prāpto matpituḥ śiṣyakatvāt |
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3880: clxvii.pituḥ śiṣyo hyātmaśiṣyo bhaveta śiṣyasyārthaḥ svīya eveti matvā |
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3881: so'yaṃ pāpo māmavajñāya mūḍho duṣṭaṃ vaco'śrāvayadasya darpam |
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3882: haniṣya ityeva matiṃ nidhāya yayau kurūñchiṣyatāṃ netumetān |
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3883: pratigrahād vinivṛttasya cārthaḥ syācchiṣyebhyaḥ kauravebhyo mamātra |
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3884: evaṃ manvānaḥ krīḍataḥ pāṇḍaveyān sadhārtarāṣṭrān purabāhyato'khyat |
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3886: kūpe na śekuḥ sahitāḥ kumārā uddhartumetaṃ pavanātmajo'vadat |
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3887: niṣpatya coddhṛtya samutpatiṣye kūpādamuṣmād bhṛśanīcādapi sma |
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3888: sakandukāṃ mudrikāṃ paśyatādya sarve kumārā iti vīryasaṃ śrayāt |
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3889: tadā kumārānavadat sa vipro dhigastrabāhyāṃ bhavatāṃ pravṛttim |
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3890: j ātāḥ kule bharatānāṃ na vittha divyāni cāstrāṇi surārcitāni |
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3891: itīritā astravidaṃ kumārā vijñāya vipraṃ surapūjyapautram |
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3897: papracchurenaṃ sahitāḥ kumārāḥ ko'sīti so'pyāha pitāmaho vaḥ |
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3898: vakteti te dudruvurāṇsu bhīṣmaṃ droṇo'yamityeva sa tāṃ stadoce |
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3899: na rājagehaṃ sa kadācideti tenādṛṣṭaḥ sa kumāraiḥ purā'taḥ |
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3900: bhīṣmo vidyāstena sahaiva cintayannastraprāptiṃ tasya śuśrāva rāmāt |
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3901: śrutvā vṛddhaṃ kṛṣṇavarṇaṃ dvijaṃ taṃ mahāstravidyāmapi tāṃ mahāmatiḥ |
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3902: droṇaṃ j ñātvā tasya śiṣyatva etān dadau kumārāṃ statra gatvā svayaṃ ca |
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3903: clxviii.droṇo'tha tānavadad yo madiṣṭaṃ kartuṃ pratijñāṃ prathamaṃ karoti
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3904: taṃ dhanvināṃ pravaraṃ sādhayiṣya ityarjunastāmakarot pratijñām |
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3905: unmādanādīni sa veda kṛṣṇādastrāṇyanāpatsu na tāni muñcet |
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3909: na buddhipūrvaṃ vara indirāpateranyatra me grāhya itaśca jiṣṇuḥ |
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3910: karotu gurvarthamiti sma cintayan bhīmaḥ pratijñāṃ na cakāra tatra |
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3911: tatpreritenārjunena pratijñā kṛt ā yadā vipravarastataḥ param |
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3912: snehaṃ nitāntaṃ surarājasūnau kṛtvā mahāstrāṇi dadau sa tasya |
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3913: sa pakṣapātaṃ ca cakāra tasmin karoti cāsyorutarāṃ praśaṃ sām |
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3914: rahasyavidyāṇsca dadāti tasya nānyasya kasyāpi tathā kathañcit |
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3915: bhīmaḥ samastaṃ pratibhābalena jānan snehaṃ tvadvitīyaṃ kaniṣṭhe |
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3916: droṇasya kṛtvā sakalāstravedinaṃ kartuṃ pārthaṃ nārjunavaccakāra |

GSP33m_mbhtnu:3922: avāpya sarve tanayā nṛpāṇāṃ śaktā babhūvurna yathaiva pūrve |
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3923: naitādṛśāḥ pūrvamāsan narendrā astre bale sarvavidyāsu caiva |
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3926: sūto niṣāda iti naitayoradādastrāṇi vipraḥ sa tu rāmaśiṣyaḥ |
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3928: vipro'pyayaṃ tamajamemi bhṛgoḥ kulotthamitthaṃ vicintya sa yayau
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3934: j ñānaṃ ca bhāgavatamapyaparāṇsca vidyā rāmādavāpya vijayaṃ dhanuragryayānam |
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3935: abdaiścaturbhiratha ca nyavasat tadante hātuṃ na śakta urugāyamimaṃ sa karṇaḥ |
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3936: aṅke nidhāya sa kadācidamuṣya rāmaḥ śiśye śiro vigatanidra udārabodhaḥ |
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3937: saṃ suptavat suravaraḥ surakāryahetordātuṃ ca vālinidhanasya phalaṃ tadasya |
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3938: tatrā'sa rākṣasavaraḥ sa tu hetināmā kāle mahendramanupāsya hi śāpato'sya
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3939: kīṭastamindra uta tatra samāviveśa karṇasya śāpamupapādayituṃ sutārthe |
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3940: karṇaḥ sa kīṭatanugena kirīṭinaiva hyūroradhastanata oparigātvacaśca |
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3941: viddhaḥ śareṇa sa yathā rudhirasya dhārāṃ susrāva taṃ vigatanidra ivā'ha
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3943: kiṃ tvaṃ na cālayasi māṃ rudhirapraseke prāpte'pi pāvanavirodhini ko'si
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3945: taṃ prāha karṇa iha naiva mayā vidheyo nidrāvirodha iti kīṭa upekṣito me |
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3946: j ātyā'smi sūta uta te tanayo'smi satyaṃ tenāsmi vipra iti bhārgavavaṃ śajo'ham |
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3947: agre'bruvaṃ bhavata īśa nahi tvadanyo mātā pitā gurutaro jagato'pi mukhyaḥ
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3948: ityuktamātravacane sa tu kīṭako'sya rāmasya dṛṣṭiviṣayatvata eva rūpam |
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3949: samprāpya naijamatipūrṇaguṇasya tasya viṣṇoranugrahata āpa vimānagaḥ svaḥ

GSP33m_mbhtnu:3951: tathā'pi te naiva vṛthā madīyā bhaktirbhavejjeṣyasi sarvaśatrūn |
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3952: aspardhamānaṃ na kathañcana tvāṃ jetā kaścit spardhamānastu yāsi |
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3953: clxx.parābhūtiṃ nātra vicāryamasti pramādī tvaṃ bhavitā cāstrasaṅghe |
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3954: yāhīti tenokta udārakarmaṇā karṇo yayau taṃ praṇamyeśitāram |
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3955: tathaikalavyo'pi nirākṛto'munā droṇena tasya pratimāṃ vane'rcayat |
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3956: tataḥ kadācid dhṛtarāṣṭraputraiḥ pāṇḍoḥ sutā mṛgayāṃ samprayātāḥ |
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3957: agre gacchan sārameyo rurāva dharmātmajasyātra vane mṛgārthī |
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3958: śrutvā rāvaṃ sārameyasya dūrāccharairmukhaṃ śabdavedhī pupūre |
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3959: sa ekalavyo vraṇamasya nākarocchvā pūritāsyaḥ pāṇḍavānabhyayāt saḥ |
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3960: dṛṣṭvā citraṃ kuravaḥ pāṇḍavāṇsca draṣṭuṃ kartāraṃ mārgayāmāsuratra |
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3963: divyānyastrāṇyāptumetāṃ ca śikṣāṃ droṇaṃ sadā pūjayati sma bhaktyā |
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3964: dṛṣṭvā viśeṣaṃ tamamuṣya pārtho droṇāyoce tvadvaro me mṛṣā'sīt |
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3965: ityukta enaṃ tvabhigamya dakṣiṇāṃ vipro yayāce dakṣiṇāṅguṣṭhameva |
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3967: tataḥ paraṃ nāsya babhūva śikṣā sanmuṣṭihīnasya samā'rjunena |
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3968: punaḥ kṛpāl . ūraivataparvate taṃ droṇaḥ prāpyā'dādastravarāṇi tasmai |
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3969: ekānta evāsya bhaktyā sutuṣṭo dhanviśreṣṭhaṃ kṛtavānarjunaṃ ca |
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3974: kāle tvetasmin bhūya evākhilaiśca nṛpairyukto māgadho yoddhukāmaḥ |
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3975: prāyād yadūṃ statra nityāvyayātibalaiśvaryo'pīcchayā'gāt sa kṛṣṇaḥ |
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3977: prāpte virodhe balibhirnītimagryāṃ yayau sarāmo dakṣiṇāṇsāṃ rameśaḥ |
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3978: so'nantavīryaḥ paramo'bhayo'pi nītyai gacchan jāmadagnyaṃ dadarśa |
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3979: krīḍārthameko'pi tato'tidurgaṃ śrutvā gomantaṃ tatra yayau sahāgrajaḥ |
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3980: tadā dugdhābdhau saṃ sṛtisthaiḥ surādyaiḥ pūjāṃ prāptuṃ sthānameṣāṃ ca yogyam |
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3983: saṃ suptavicchaśya udārakarmā sañjñāyai devānāṃ mukhamīkṣyāprameyaḥ |
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3987: gatvā pātāl . aṃ yudhi jitvā baliṃ ca kirīṭamādāyābhyayād yatra kṛṣṇaḥ |
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3988: tat tasya śīrṣṇi pratimucya natvā khagaḥ stutvā devadevaṃ rameśam |
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3989: smṛta āgacchetyeva visarjito'munā yayau dugdhābdhiṃ yatra nārāyaṇo'sau |
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3990: kirīṭaṃ tat kṛṣṇamūrdhni praviṣṭaṃ tattulyamāsīt tasya rūpeṣvabhedāt |
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3991: tadicchayā caiva nārāyaṇasya śīrṣṇyapyāsīd yugapad dugdhavārdhau |
